name: Storybook Creator 4 Page
summary: An SBPAGE file is a scrapbook page created by version 4 of the now-discontinued Creative Memories Storybook Creator scrapbook designing software. It is a Zip-compressed archive that contains the content of a page, including text, shapes, and images, and metadata describing the page. FOREVER Artisan replaced Creative Memories software and introduced .ARTPAGE files and .A6PAGE files to replace SBPAGE files with versions 5 and 6 of Artisan software.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
